tool_description: Compares actual property conditions against compliance requirements to identify specific zoning violations and non-conforming uses.

property_conditions.description: JSON string of current property conditions

error_messages: Invalid compliance data: Compliance requirements must be in valid JSON format.
Invalid property conditions: Property conditions must be in valid JSON format.
Missing comparison data: Both actual and permitted use information are required.
Analysis error: Unable to complete violation analysis due to data inconsistencies.
usage: Input actual and permitted uses along with compliance requirements and current conditions. This tool identifies specific violations that may require enforcement action.
